channel.title: This may be a stupid question
channel.description:
ok, so this may be a stupid question but how do you upload your client onto like megaupload or something? I tried turning it into a .rar file and my friend tried to dl it and it just came out as a bunch of icons and when he tried to run it it said like unrecognizable source. please help
-Kaelen-

item.title: This may be a stupid question
item.dc:creator: @kaelen92 kaelen92
item.description:

nevermind, I did the wrong right-click option. Thanks for the help HBG

item.title: This may be a stupid question
item.dc:creator: @hah_bah_gee hah bah gee
item.description:
@hah_bah_gee wrote:

ok, right click the folder that has the server in it…

Now click add to (foldername here).rar

Now open the internet and go to uppit.com

Click browse, find the .rar file you just created, wait for it to upload.

Now it will give you 2 links, 1 to delete and 1 to download, copy the download link and post it wherever you want it for others to download…

Hope this helps,

 ~HBG~

Read full topic
item.source: This may be a stupid question
